entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
